name: Castle Salem
description:
Controls:

WASD - The usual

On platforms press S to go back down, or jump through them

Press E to Open chests

Left Click to shoot

Space To Jump/Wall Climb/Wall Jump

Holding A or D on the wall allows wall climbing, not holding them allows wall jumping.

Game:

The Objective is to get as many crystals as you can get before the time runs out, your goal is to defeat the boss with the best RNG luck for your buffs that u can get!

(If at any point you cant respawn please refresh browser)

Music by: https://open.spotify.com/artist/2Jvj17DdGGEYazBG8fMEjD

Art by KAZ & Bob

Programming by Ben
